entities.name: goblet
entities.description: A magical object that contains flames, described as turning red and shooting sparks.

entities.name: victor krum
entities.description: The champion for Durmstrang, announced by Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A person who caught the piece of parchment and read it aloud.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: A person who yelled 'No surprises there!' in response to Dumbledore's announcement.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: A person who saw Viktor Krum rise from the Slytherin table.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: A person who boomed 'Bravo, Viktor!' in praise of Viktor Krum.

entities.name: durmstrang
entities.description: A school that Viktor Krum represents.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: A house in the school where Harry saw Viktor Krum rise from.

entities.name: parchment
entities.description: A piece of parchment that was charred and flew out of the goblet.

relationships.description: Dumbledore announced Viktor Krum as the champion for Durmstrang.
Ron yelled 'No surprises there!' in response to Dumbledore's announcement of Viktor Krum as the champion.
Harry saw Viktor Krum rise from the Slytherin table.
Karkaroff boomed 'Bravo, Viktor!' in praise of Viktor Krum.
